item.title: How to change the Quest Interface text?
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

trust me if you cant figure it out you have no business trying to run a server

It’s the simplest thing to fix. I agree with silab, if you don’t know simple java, don’t make a server.

item.title: How to change the Quest Interface text?
item.dc:creator: @test123 test123
item.description:
@test123 wrote:

How about just giving awnserver:

I did this though:
Add this:

[code] public void loadQuestInterface() {
sendFrame126("@ora@Quest Journal", 640);
sendFrame126("@ora@Quest Points", 641);

	sendFrame126("@ora@FREE QUESTS:", 663);
	sendFrame126("@red@Black Knight's Fortress", 7332);
	sendFrame126("@red@Cook's Assistant", 7333);
	sendFrame126("@red@Demon Slayer", 7334);
	sendFrame126("@red@Doric's Quest", 7335);
	sendFrame126("@red@Dragon Slayer", 7336);
	sendFrame126("@red@Ernest the Chicken", 7337);
	sendFrame126("@red@Goblin Diplomacy", 7338);
	sendFrame126("@red@Imp Catcher", 7339);
	sendFrame126("@red@The Knight's Sword", 7340);
	sendFrame126("@red@Pirate's Treasure", 7341);
	sendFrame126("@red@Prince Ali Rescue", 7342);
	sendFrame126("@red@The Restless Ghost", 7343);
	sendFrame126("@red@Romeo & Juliet", 7344);
	sendFrame126("@red@Rune Mysteries Quest", 7345);
	sendFrame126("@red@Sheep Shearer", 7346);
	sendFrame126("@red@Shield of Arrav", 7347);
	sendFrame126("@red@Vampire Slayer", 7348);
	sendFrame126("@red@Witch's Potion", 7349);

	sendFrame126("@ora@MEMBERS QUESTS:", 12772);
}[/code]

But then I need to put this in run() but where I place it, I logout when I try to login (using (updated) BlakeScape):

loadQuestInterface();
